intro.heading: Experience A Blend of Nature, Comfort, and Luxury
intro.paragraph1: Nestled among the rice fields and coconut trees of Tabanan, Ulaman is only 20 minutes away from the vibrant town of Canggu.
intro.paragraph2: An award-winning eco-luxury resort offering a unique hideaway experience. Embrace authenticity, balance, and harmony with nature in a healing, luxurious environment.

facilities.name: Holistic Spa
facilities.description: Rejuvenate your body and soul with our world-class holistic spa treatments.

facilities.name: Organic Restaurant
facilities.description: Dine on fresh, locally-sourced, and organic farm-to-table cuisine.

facilities.name: Yoga Shala
facilities.description: Find your center at our breathtaking bamboo yoga shala overlooking the river.

facilities.name: Jungle Gym
facilities.description: Stay active in our unique fitness center equipped with state-of-the-art machines.

facilities.name: High-Speed Wi-Fi
facilities.description: Stay connected with complimentary high-speed internet across the entire resort.

facilities.name: Complimentary Parking
facilities.description: Enjoy peace of mind with our secure and complimentary on-site parking.
